com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.net

Class ConnectivityReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.net.ConnectivityReceiver

  • public class ConnectivityReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when connectivity changes. Not public api.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static ConnectivityReceiver instance(@NonNull
                                            android.content.Context context)
        Get a single instance of ConnectivityReceiver.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to extract the application context from
        Returns:
        single instance of ConnectivityReceiver

      • activate

        @UiThread
public void activate()
        Activates the connectivity receiver.

        if the underlying connectivity receiver isn't active, register the connectivity receiver.

      • deactivate

        @UiThread
public void deactivate()
        Deactivates the connectivity receiver.

        if no other components are listening, unregister the underlying connectivity receiver.

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(@NonNull
                      android.content.Context context,
                      android.content.Intent intent)
        Specified by:
        onReceive in class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

      • setConnected

        public void setConnected(java.lang.Boolean connected)
        Overwrites system connectivity state. To set, use Mapbox.setConnected(Boolean).
        Parameters:
        connected - flag to determine the connectivity state, true for connected, false for disconnected, and null for ConnectivityManager to determine.

      • addListener

                        ConnectivityListener listener)

        Parameters:

        public boolean isConnected()
        Get current connectivity state
        Returns:
